Package wtf.choco.veinminer

Interface VeinMiner

All Known Implementing Classes:
VeinMinerServer
public interface VeinMiner
A class holding VeinMiner's core common functionality.

  • Field Details

    • PATTERN_BLOCK_STATE

      static final Pattern PATTERN_BLOCK_STATE
      A pattern to match a Minecraft block state. e.g. minecraft:chest[waterlogged=false]
      • Group 1: The block's type
      • Group 2: The block's states (without the [] brackets)

    • PROTOCOL_CHANNEL

      static final NamespacedKey PROTOCOL_CHANNEL
      The NamespacedKey of the VeinMiner messaging channel.
      See Also:
      • VeinMiner.PROTOCOL.getChannel()

    • PROTOCOL_VERSION

      static final int PROTOCOL_VERSION
      The version of the VeinMiner protocol.
      See Also:
      • VeinMiner.PROTOCOL.getVersion()
      • Constant Field Values

    • PROTOCOL

      static final PluginMessageProtocol PROTOCOL
      VeinMiner's messaging protocol.
      See Also:
      • PluginMessageProtocol

    • PROTOCOL_LEGACY

      @Deprecated(since="2.0.0", forRemoval=true) static final PluginMessageProtocol PROTOCOL_LEGACY
      Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
      legacy
      The legacy protocol for versions before VeinMiner 2.0.0. This protocol is not to be used under any circumstances.
      See Also:
      • modern protocol

  • Method Details

    • getVersion

      @NotNull @NotNull String getVersion()
      Get the version of VeinMiner (not to be confused with the protocol version).
      Returns:
      the version

    • isServer

      boolean isServer()
      Check whether or not VeinMiner is running on the server.
      Returns:
      true if running on the server, false if running on the client
      See Also:
      • isClient()

    • isClient

      default boolean isClient()
      Check whether or not VeinMiner is running on the client.
      Returns:
      true if running on the client, false if running on the server

      • isServer()
